column1: Smoque BBQ////at smoque the menu is simple
column2: so its easy to try all the things offered. the baby back ribs and brisket is our usual choice (platters of course)
column3: the meat is tender and juicy
column4: but the bbq sauce is super vinegary for my taste. i would prefer if it was sweeter.. Â the half chicken looks juicy
column5: the texas sausage is a bit boring compared to the other meats.
